title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 May 2012 - XWiki
content:
10:23 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
10:32 <CIA-74> tmortagne master \* rf447076 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/f4470768c30f9f6d147ff3c116ab97a9689682b1 / (8 files in 8 dirs): [extensin] Add missing properties - http://git.io/YO3ysg  
10:32 <CIA-74> tmortagne master \* r193e043 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/193e0435f2630752ac0f67d865300330a004b8b6 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ircbot/xwiki-platform-ircbot-ui/pom.xml : [extension] Ad missing property - http://git.io/yVfKTg  
10:57 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <Shaddox> has joined #xwiki  
11:23 <CIA-74> Vincent Massol master \* rd1560c7 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/d1560c7ba487b479193470572d7295e2d36c8e88 / pom.xml : XCOMMONS-157: Speed up Java Compilation ...  
11:23 <CIA-74> Vincent Massol master \* r0010f28 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/0010f28b82ff8d27e7ce7e0402a8097c9d83b85f / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-test/src/main/java/org/xwiki/test/AbstractMockingComponentTestCase.java : [Misc] Improve javadoc - http://git.io/rYFssg  
11:26 <jvelo\_> has joined #xwiki  
11:28 <jvelo> has quit  
11:28 <jvelo\_> is now known as <jvelo>  
11:34 <vmassol> good morning  
11:34 <vmassol> back from holidays  
11:35 <vmassol> tmortagne: 4.0 has been released right? I still see its roadmap on http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap  
11:35 <+tmortagne> vmassol: yes it has been released  
11:36 <vmassol> seems you missed the last step of http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ReleaseProcess ;)  
11:36 <vmassol> BTW I need to check if 4.0 is on maven central too or not, if not I'll push it  
11:37 <vmassol> yeah it's not there, pushing  
11:37 <+tmortagne> vmassol: it's not, at least I did not pushed it since I never was able to do it  
11:37 <vmassol> tmortagne: can you handle the roadmap page?  
11:37 <+tmortagne> i'm on it  
11:38 <vmassol> kewl  
11:39 <sburjan> welcome back Vincentio :)  
11:39 <vmassol> vincenzo  
11:39 <vmassol> :)  
11:40 <sburjan> right :)  
11:40 <vmassol> thanks  
11:42 <vmassol> hmm I also need to push 3.5.1  
11:42 <CIA-74> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r2e27a76 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/2e27a76b39f322c3dc93ce4e6994aa638b769c23 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-livetable/src/main/resources/XWiki/LiveTableResultsMacros.xml : XWIKI-7801 : Filter hidden documents in LiveTable results ...  
11:43 <+tmortagne> vmassol: looks like 4.1M1 release is already late  
11:43 <+tmortagne> who is the release manager ?  
11:46 <Shaddox> has quit  
11:50 <vmassol> I need to check for the RM but I think it's cjd  
11:51 <vmassol> I see there's a blocker for 4.1  
11:51 <vmassol> (and 4.0.1)  
11:51 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-7791  
11:52 <vmassol> does anyone know if someone is working on it?  
11:53 <CIA-74> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r94a1f2e https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/94a1f2ed65df8031b03a97b744b49928e248cc23 / xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/selenium/AllDocsTest.java : XWIKI-7801 : Filter hidden documents in LiveTable results ...  
11:54 <+tmortagne> vmassol: I think Denis looked at it but not sue what's the status  
11:54 <vmassol> cjd: are you the RM for 4.1?  
11:55 <vmassol> tmortagne: I'm failing to build commons 4.0  
11:55 <+tmortagne> vmassol: seems to work well on jenkins, what error to you get ?  
11:56 <+tmortagne> ha 4.0  
11:56 <vmassol> https://gist.github.com/2652215  
11:56 <+tmortagne> well I did not had any issue when I released it  
11:56 <vmassol> yes 4.0, the tag  
11:56 <+Denis> vmassol: I have not check the code to be sure there is no real issue, but there is a lot of chance that we have an id collision, something that we cannot really avoid  
11:56 <vmassol> I know why  
11:56 <vmassol> that's because of the clirr behavior I noticed before  
11:57 <vmassol> if you're in SNAPSHOT and the module doesn't exist it works ok by skipping it  
11:57 <vmassol> but if you're not on snapshot it fails saying the module doesn't exist  
11:57 <+tmortagne> well it did not complained during release  
11:57 <vmassol> I'll build with clirr skip but that's not very nice  
11:58 <vmassol> we need to dig a bit  
11:58 <+tmortagne> well it sounds like a clirr bug  
11:58 <vmassol> we need to debug the clirr plugin  
11:58 <vmassol> and possibily submit a patch to ignore when a module doesn't exist  
11:58 <vmassol> (if it's a clirr bug)  
12:02 <@cjd> Yes, I volunteered to do the release.  
12:02 <vmassol> ok cool (wasn't sure, the holidays have erased part of my memory ;))  
12:02 <@cjd> oh and I'm late :(  
12:02 <vmassol> cjd: we need to have the roadmap up on the roadmap page first  
12:03 <vmassol> and yes we need to start gathering everyone ASAP to release 4.1M1  
12:03 <vmassol> tmortagne: you've put 4.1 amready?  
12:03 <vmassol> \*already  
12:04 <vmassol> tmortagne: there's a problem with "See what was done in the http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise40.  
12:04 <vmassol> Check the http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/Dashboard.jspa?selectPageId=10891."  
12:04 <+tmortagne> vmassol: "you've put 4.1 already", what should I put ?  
12:04 <vmassol> I was just asking if you had created the 4.1 roadmap  
12:05 <vmassol> based on the mail proposal  
12:05 <vmassol> or if you're doing it  
12:05 <vmassol> it seems not complete so maybe you're doing it  
12:05 <+tmortagne> i'm not done yet  
12:06 <vmassol> ?  
12:06 <vmassol> ok  
12:06 <sburjan> I see here: http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Features a "Database Support" which is outdated. I am not sure if we should keep or remove this, since we already have this defined at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DatabaseSupportStrategy. WDYT ?  
12:07 <+tmortagne> vmassol: could you create the 4.1 jira dashboard ?  
12:07 <vmassol> sburjan: yep we need to update that, need to think about the best solution  
12:08 <vmassol> (I'm stacking threads right now...)  
12:08 <sburjan> we can either use an include, or just put the link in there.. or maybe remove the whole item because it's not consistent. Browser Support doesn't have a category also  
12:08 <vmassol> sburjan: I think something about standards would be good  
12:09 <vmassol> sburjan: can you ping me again later this afternoon about it?  
12:09 <sburjan> vmassol: yes, ofc  
12:14 <vmassol> tmortagne: http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/Dashboard.jspa?selectPageId=11090  
12:14 <+tmortagne> vmassol: thanks  
12:15 <+tmortagne> roadmap page should be ready now  
12:16 <vmassol> tmortagne: when was 4.0 released? (so that I can cross it on the page)  
12:17 <+tmortagne> vmassol: 30 April  
12:17 <vmassol> jvdrean: can you list your jira issues in there?  
12:17 <vmassol> ok pfew we're still in April ,)  
12:17 <vmassol> ;)  
12:17 <+tmortagne> :)  
12:17 <+tmortagne> was short  
12:18 <+jvdrean> vmassol: sure  
12:19 <vmassol> mflorea/tmortagne: is the XAR merge UI listed? Can you make sure you have cretaed all the required jira issues for 4.1?  
12:20 <vmassol> mflorea: for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7374 we were thinking about getting sergiu's help instead since you need to focus on the EM UI, wdyt?  
12:21 <vmassol> having a new module to generate page ids is something generic that sergiu could work on  
12:21 <vmassol> (to free you some time)  
12:32 <+mflorea> vmassol: re XWIKI-7374, I don't mind, if it is a priority then go ahead and ask Sergiu if he wants to work on it.  
12:33 <vmassol> "mflorea/tmortagne: is the XAR merge UI listed? Can you make sure you have cretaed all the required jira issues for 4.1?"  
12:33 <vmassol> mflorea: ok I'll ask him because it's a prority  
12:33 <vmassol> (that's why it's listed in priority 1 on the roadmap page ;))  
12:54 <mflorea> has quit  
13:44 <vmassol> sburjan: "We (Mozilla) are dropping support for Firefox 3.6. Yesterday,we have activated automatic updates from Firefox 3.6 to Firefox 12.". So I think we (you?) should send a vote to propose dropping support for FF 3.6. WDYT?  
13:46 <sburjan> vmassol: yes, I will send the vote. I was waiting for this official announcement for some time now. Can you give me the link where you found this please, so I can include it in the vote proposal ?  
13:46 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
13:49 <vmassol> http://inagist.com/all/200513487896707072/  
13:51 <sburjan> yes, I read about 24 April, I was looking at a thread on the mozilla lists and seems they didn't agreed, so  I didn't consider it official  
13:54 <sburjan> ok, found something official: https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Planning/2012-05-09#Release\_.2812.2C\_10esr.2C\_3.6.29  
13:54 <sburjan> sending vote  
14:02 <vmassol> argh  
14:02 <vmassol> who released 3.5.1?  
14:02 <vmassol> whoever released xwiki rendering 3.5.1 made a mistake  
14:02 <vmassol> and didn't release rendernig-standalone properly  
14:02 <vmassol> it has 3.5-SNAPSHOT in the 3.5.1 tag  
14:03 <vmassol> as you can see from here: http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/org/xwiki/rendering/xwiki-rendering-standalone/  
14:03 <vmassol> (it's not been released)  
14:03 <vmassol> it's sergiu AFAIR  
14:03 <vmassol> pinging him about it on skype  
14:05 <vmassol> thus I cannot release 3.5.1 on maven central ATM  
14:05 <sburjan> vmassol: vote sent  
14:07 <sburjan> has quit  
14:08 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
14:19 <CIA-74> tmortagne master \* r7209095 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/72090955e29210d82b333d7c9289c87216e5dd3e / (4 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7806: Also import versions of former extension id in XR - http://git.io/HAst9A  
14:30 <pgmjsd> has quit  
14:30 <CIA-74> tmortagne master \* r64111ee https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/64111eea6b2b49242a4de14b78f7ac5578e87d67 / xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-rest/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/rest/PageResourceTest.java : Fix assert parameters order - http://git.io/JLJByg  
14:32 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
15:17 <jvdrean> has quit  
15:19 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
15:25 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
15:33 <@cjd> Denis: are you aware of http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7791 ?  
15:36 <+tmortagne> cjd: he is  
15:37 <+tmortagne> cjd: "(11:55:07 AM) Denis: vmassol: I have not check the code to be sure there is no real issue, but there is a lot of chance that we have an id collision, something that we cannot really avoid"  
15:38 <@cjd> ahh ok  
15:39 <@cjd> so should we close it as "necessary evil"?  
15:46 <+Denis> cjd: need at least to keep it to check there is not a issue in the way we compute this id, but I am confident it will not. IMO, not a blocker  
15:47 <@cjd> ok, maybe you want to downgrade the criticality? (notaword)  
15:50 <@cjd> I'd rather not release with blockers on the bug tracker, it kind of takes away the meaning of `blocker'
